name: @vk-x/inject
description: Inject a script into a page from a browser extension

scripts.build: printf "/* inject v1.1.0 (c) Nikita Litvin, git.io/vwPBs */\n\n" > index.js && coffee --compile --bare --no-header --print index.coffee >> index.js

author: Nikita Litvin <n@deltaidea.com> (https://github.com/deltaidea)
